Move upMove downToggle panel: Web Accessibility page BANNER TEXT Comprehensive Accessibility Testing Services ensures equal access to all BANNER TEXT DESC Follow best practices to ensure compliance to accessibility regulations Web Accessibility Accessibility testing Accessibility Process Differentiators ACCESSIBILITY PROCESS TITLE Accessibility Testing – Process: ACCESSIBILITY PROCESS TITLE DESC In line with latest industry standards in UK, TestingXperts has the following process for accessibility testing: ACCESSIBILITY PROCESS CONTENT Add MediaVisualText
  • With interactions between the client and the testing team, we prepare the tasks for participants of website accessibility testing or other applications.
  • Tests are then conducted from usability perspective and via remote testing.
  • On-boarding users with a range of disabilities, as suitable for the product to help in testing.
  • Analyzing and prioritising the findings, making recommendations.
  • Testing with Assistive Technology and Devices (Screen Reader)
  • Carry out a POC to find out if any accesibility issues/ bugs exist with the testing protocol.
ACCESSIBILITY PROCESS IMAGE Accessibility testing process Move upMove downToggle panel: Custom Fields Name Value Key ampforwp-amp-on-off Value default Key om_disable_all_campaigns Value Key wpil_links_inbound_internal_count Value 0 Key wpil_links_outbound_external_count Value 0 Key wpil_links_outbound_internal_count Value 0 Key wpil_sync_report2_time Value 2023-06-14T07:59:52+00:00 Key wpil_sync_report3 Value 1 Add New Custom Field: Name Value — Select — Enter new Custom fields can be used to add extra metadata to a post that you can use in your theme. Move upMove downToggle panel: Author Author developer (developer) Move upMove downToggle panel: Slug Slug web-accessibility-testing-services-uk Move upMove downToggle panel: Contextual Related Posts Disable Related Posts display: If this is checked, then Contextual Related Posts will not automatically insert the related posts at the end of post content. Exclude this post from the related posts list: If this is checked, then this post will be excluded from the popular posts list. Keyword: Enter either a word or a phrase that will be used to find related posts. If entered, the plugin will continue to search the `post_title` and `post_content` fields but will use this keyword instead of the values of the title and content of this post. Manual related posts: Comma separated list of post, page or custom post type IDs. e.g. 188,320,500. These will be given preference over the related posts generated by the plugin. Once you enter the list above and save this page, the plugin will display the titles of the posts below for your reference. Only IDs corresponding to published posts or custom post types will be retained. Location of thumbnail: Enter the full URL to the image (JPG, PNG or GIF) you’d like to use. This image will be used for the post. It will be resized to the thumbnail size set under Settings » Related Posts » Output Options The URL above is saved in the meta field: post-image Move upMove downToggle panel: Collect.chat Script:
